signUp:TermsRequired: You must agree to the Recycle+Save terms and conditions.
signUp:PrivacyRequired: You must agree to the Recycle+Save privacy policy.
signUp:Terms: I confirm that I have read and agree to the Terracycle Terms & Conditions

signUp:Title: Create account
signUp:SocialLogin: Or use your social account to log in:

pwSetup:PasswordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long, contain at least one lowercase character, one uppercase character and one of the following characters: !#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@^_`{|}~ and space.
pwSetup:Title: Password setup
pwSetup:Description: Please choose a password for your account:

Take a picture to save your item.
